name: Friendertale - Undertale Fan-battle
description:
An Undertale Fan Battle, inspired in Friendestiny, an animated YouTube series. Defeat Special, the demigod of the Alternative Universes in a friendly training battle.

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAmgZIjWu25XUr26J65p5rpq-UacJLZWg

CONTROLS

- WASD/Arrow keys to move

- TAB/SPACEBAR to attack and jump dialogues

CREDITS

- Ferplay (Head programmer)

- PliniOP (Artist and animator)

MUSICS USED

- Determination and Menu (Toby Fox)

- Tokyovania NITRO Remix (Nick Nitro)
